prompts.gameManager:
Unity 3D GameManager script generator. Coordinates all puzzle objects and manages game flow.
**Requirements:**
- Design overall puzzle progression and object interactions
- Pure logic implementation (no UI/rendering/audio systems)
- Analyze Room Prefab structure for proper object references and placement
- Create comprehensive interaction framework for all puzzle objects
- Include component caching, event systems, state management
**Allowed features:** Component references, coroutines, collision detection, trigger interactions, state management, data serialization
**Input:** All puzzle object data + Room Prefab structure (GitHub .txt URL)
**Output:** Raw JSON only (no markdown formatting)
{
  "GameManager.cs": "using UnityEngine;public class GameManager:MonoBehaviour{void Start(){...}}"
}
prompts.individualObject:
Unity 3D individual object script generator.
**Requirements:**
- Generate script for ONE specified object only
- Follow GameManager's design patterns and integration methods
- Pure logic implementation (no UI/rendering/audio systems)
- Self-contained functionality with public methods for GameManager interaction
- Match GameManager's component references and event system
**Allowed features:** Component caching, public methods for external calls, state management, collision detection
**Input:** Target object name + All puzzle object data + GameManager script
**Output:** Raw JSON only (no markdown formatting)
{
  "ObjectName.cs": "using UnityEngine;public class ObjectName:MonoBehaviour{void Start(){...}}"
}
